subject: Re: Re: Re: #SSN1434
description_text:
That's great, thank you very much.

On Tue, 3 Jun 2025, 11:47 General and sales enquiries, <service@simsonn.com>
wrote:

> Hi, we have refunded you, your clutch has been dispatched and will update
> you with your logistics number tomorrow. Thank you for your understanding
> and sorry for the inconvenience!
>
>
> Gabriel Rozanski<gabrielrozanski9@gmail.com> 在 2025年6月2日 周一 21:50 写道：
> Hi,
>
> I understand, thanks for checking for me therefore, in this case, could I
> just receive a refund compensation, as a new control box won't be needed,
> as I have no interest in the haptic modules, even if they are quite
> interesting.
>
> Thanks
>
> On Fri, May 30, 2025 at 10:04 AM General and sales enquiries <
> service@simsonn.com> wrote:
>
>> Hi, the base plate you can flatten with a hammer, this won't have any
>> effect on the use, although it's certainly not as perfect as it could be .
>> The cost for us to send a base plate will incur high shipping costs, if you
>> are interested in our haptic modules we can gift you a new control box to
>> fit them, hope you you take up the offer, thanks.
>>
>>
>> Gabriel Rozanski<gabrielrozanski9@gmail.com> 在 2025年5月30日 周五 16:14 写道：
>> Hello,
>>
>> Yes, I will accept this offer, however there isn't anything you can do
>> about the plate it self being bent?
>>
>> Gabriel
>>
>> On Fri, 30 May 2025, 09:11 General and sales enquiries, <
>> service@simsonn.com> wrote:
>>
>>> Hi, I'm sorry it took so long to deal with your problem. We can't do
>>> anything about it because the logistics provider doesn't recognize the
>>> damage, hope you can understand. We can send you a replacement clutch and
>>> refund $29 as compensation, do you accept this option?
>>>
>>>
>>> Gabriel Rozanski<gabrielrozanski9@gmail.com> 在 2025年5月30日 周五 16:05 写道：
>>> Good morning,
>>>
>>> Could I please request an update regarding the email i have sent around
>>> a week ago about my damaged products that I received.
>>>
>>> Gabriel
>>>
>>
